title: Ziegler Condensed
content:
Looks quite cool, could somebody say what font this is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011014053im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ziegler_4561.jpg)
  
Thanks very much for any help.
author: writingdesigning

comments.content:
Hi Arun,

[Akzidenz Grotesk Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011014053/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/akzidenz-grotesk-be/light-condensed/?rendersettings=1&antialiasing=1&hinting=1&PREFS_SET%5BRenderString%5D=ZIEGLER) is really close if you chop off the ‘G’ spur …

F

Somehow never had seen a condensed version of Akzidenz Grotesk. Thanks very much Florian!

----  
Arun  
----
